body: @U.P.R.Y  you do know that ankoman has made a new hentai a week ago, another one 2 weeks ago.

@U.P.R.Y you're absolutely right, quality comes before quantity, whether it's black and white or ah color, while agobitch neesan takes the time to draw every detail from scratch, this ankoman slacker just takes one of his ready-made images and he only changes their face, leaving the rest as it is and that shows in his last doujins, being so, who knows if his first doujinshis will have been made by him or copied from someone else?

ankoman takes almost a month to make a 5 page, black and white and always with the same plot doujin.  Meanwhile, agobitch neesan has already published 4 colored doujins with a very good story and an amazing artstyle (although it's short, everything else makes it worth it).  But even so, he's less recognized than this motherfucker ankoman

another shitty doujinshi, deforming a good character like astolfo and turning him into this ridiculous fuckboy attempt, in addition to reusing the same old images just changing their faces, maybe if you took longer to make your doujishis you could do something of quality in shit place ever
